amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds made available in the Act from being used to implement, administer, or enforce the economic embargo of Cuba.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rangel amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 245 (Roll no. 284).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A044) offered by Mr. Rangel.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Rangel amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 245 (Roll no. 284).
